page.title: 17COMMUTER HEAGE.
page.content: Analysis showed that the majority of parents commute to work to within a 12 mile radius of the village.There is a great diversity of occupations.People travel to local towns to shop. COMMUTING INTO HEAGE. Many people commute into Heage to work at the industry site,Church Street.It has grown from a small family joinery works to a large group of companies which includes civil engineering,plant hire and joinery. COMMUTING AT SCHOOL. 199 pupils.Many children travel by bus or car.On Mondays top juniors travel to Ripley pool for swimming lessons.In September the fourth year juniors go to Comprehensive schools.I'm sad about leaving.I've enjoyed school especially a visit this year,to the Isle of Wight.The school is the centre of village life,clubs,Brownies,Scouts etc
